attributes.action: Deselect Ed balls and Yvette Cooper.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the Daily telegraph report Ed Balls and Yvette Cooper would appear to be guilty of using the system of parliamentary expenses to claim benefits which are ' milking ' the system.

rejection.details: Deselection is a party matter rather than a Government matter and your concerns should be addressed to the party.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
